[basic explain]
施放技能时， 有10%%的几率使自身进入霸体状态。

[detail explain]
施放技能时， 有10%%的几率使自身进入霸体状态10秒。

[if]
    [cooltime]
        20000
    [casting]
        1
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `myself`    -1
    [duration]
        10000
    [probability]
        10
    [buff]
        `superarmor`
[/then]
